text:
Pornhub | Adult content | Montreal QC | On-site Come work at the 15th highest trafficked website in the world. We are looking for:

-Senior PHP developers

-Front-end Developer

-Product Manager

-Product Marketing Manager

Must be willing to relocate to Montreal. Email me your CV: jobs@pornhub.com and please mention you saw the post on HN. Some more info on pornhub.com/jobs.
